metadata.title: CVE-2018-11419 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in JerryScript 1.0. There is a heap-based bufferover-read in the lit_read_code_unit_from_hex function via a RegExp("[\\u0")payload, related to re_parse_char_class in parser/regexp/re-parser.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
